title: #614: First Friday: The Dollar Is Weak, Bonds Are Expensive, and We Owe WWII-Level Debt
description: The US just added 139,000 new jobs in May. That beat expectations. But the real story isn’t in the job numbers — it’s in the bond market. Something unusual is happening in bonds. Treasury yields are spiking. The dollar is weakening. That combination almost never happens together. And it’s signaling concerns about future inflation. Trade [...]
author: Paula Pant
